articles.description: Mercy Mae Avila Darwin, 48, said her 71-year-old husband John, who faked his death in the North Sea for money in 2002, is 'on his way' to join troops fighting against Russian forces.
articles.content:
'Canoe man' John Darwin is willing to travel to Ukraine to fight, according to his second wife - who insists he has 'good life insurance'.  
Mercy Mae Avila Darwin, 48, said her 71-year-old husband,… [+12299 chars]
